courses.title: Piano for Beginners
courses.description: Learn basic piano skills including chords, scales, and beginner songs.

courses.title: Guitar Basics
courses.description: Start your guitar journey with chords, strumming, and simple melodies.

courses.title: Singing Foundations
courses.description: Develop proper vocal techniques and control in this beginner-friendly course.

courses.title: Music Theory Made Easy
courses.description: Understand scales, keys, intervals, and chords in a simple, practical way.

courses.title: Jazz Improvisation
courses.description: Learn the art of jazz improvisation with this course designed for all levels.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production
courses.description: Create EDM, house, and lo-fi beats using professional tools and techniques.

courses.title: Drumming Essentials
courses.description: Build your timing, rhythm, and coordination through practical drumming lessons.

courses.title: Advanced Guitar Techniques
courses.description: Master fingerstyle, tapping, and more in this advanced guitar course.

courses.title: Vocal Training for Beginners
courses.description: Improve your vocal range, tone, and breathing with expert-led exercises.

courses.title: Composing for Film
courses.description: Learn how to compose and produce cinematic music for film and media.
